title: Carnitas
steps: Combine pork, water, oil, salt, juices, garlic, bay leaves, cinnamon in Dutch oven.
Bring to boil, reduce to bare simmer. Cover, cook 2 hours, flipping halfway.
Uncover, continue cooking until liquid evaporates and pork fries in rendered fat, about 1 hour.
Once frying, stir occasionally until all sides crispy.
Shred meat, mixing crispy bits throughout.
Serve in warm tortillas with onion, cilantro, salsa.
notes: Mix crispy bits with tender meat.
